description: Runs a local script on a remote node after transferring it

creates.description: a filename, when it already exists, this step will B(not) be run.

decrypt.description: This option controls the autodecryption of source files using vault.

free_form.description: path to the local script file followed by optional arguments. There is no parameter actually named 'free form'; see the examples!

removes.description: a filename, when it does not exist, this step will B(not) be run.
